game.name: Ultimate Swish Game
game.description:
You are the best player of your basketball team. Today the biggest single-player basketball championship is going on and you are going to represent your country. It is very challenging since you have to make points before the time runs out. Do you still want to participate in this highly addictive and tricky brand new sports game? Join Ultimate Swish and be prepared to secure as many points as possible within 1 minute! Common friends, it is a matter of the pride of your country!

When you click the play button, you would see a player with a basketball in his hand. The right middle corner of the screen will show you how to set an angle to throw your ball. Your ball can shot ball only when you press the spacebar and click the screen to stop the ball indicators. Track how much time is left and how many points you have scored by looking at the top left corner of the screen in this HTML5 basketball game!

It depends on your talents and physics abilities how many baskets you can make before your time is over. Hey boys! Do your best to clear more balls through the hoop to rack up the maximum possible points! Press the spacebar or click the mouse to stop the ball in order to make a shot! Remember it will be easier to make a perfect shot if you stop the ball closely to the center. Score as many points as you can in 70 seconds by swishing all 25 balls into the hoop!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP THE SCREEEN TO STOP THE BALL INDICATORS AND SHOT THE BALL
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO CONTROL THE INDICATOR AND MAKE THE GOLE
